pos review: free parking, free refreshments in lounge and good wifi connection Helpful staff and proximity to public transport
neg review: Breakfast ok very busy and hectic
Stayed 2 nights, but on both days there was a huge line for breakfast (around 7.15). Had to skip breakfast to be in time for work. Too bad because the breakfast is fine.

pos review: Unfortunately, I did not eat breakfast. However, they do offer tea/drinks near the reception.
neg review: The elevator wasn't working when I stayed. Also, it must be due to the weather, but I had a hard time sleeping because it was kind of warm. Solved the problem by leaving the balcony door open. Also, TV was not working during stay.

pos review: Standard and over aged Hotel, so all is basic but good for short stay only. 24hrs Free coffee is a good initiative. Views from my room (backroom) were a factory roof.   Free Parking in front of hotel is a plus point
neg review: Rooms are very small and location is far out. No shops around the hotel. Not recommended for families.  No bar in the hotel.  Got the impression it is more a hotel for workers or sailors in standby.

Stayed before at the rear of the hotel . Really quiet.
Unfortunately this time had a room overlooking the main road . On a hot night with the window open, it was noisey. 
Good price thought.
Breakfast was good .

pos review: Goog lounge and very good breakfast
neg review: No hair dryer in the bathroom
Bit out of the center, but many busses and tram stop in front of the hotel and a train station is 4 minutes away
